name: Puerto Rican Adobo Steamed Fish
description: Fish is an excellent source of lean protein and a great way to get heart-healthy omega-3 fatty acids.
preparation: In a medium-sized bowl, marinate fish in adobo sauce for at least 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to at 350° F (175° C).
Place fish in foil packages and seal. Bake for approximately 10–15 minutes, until fish flakes with a fork. Serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a side salad and prepared Epicure Dressing.
